Bash(/Users/jatassi/Git/SlipStream/internal/library/scanner/parsedebug2_test.go <<'GOEOF'
package scanner

import \(
	"fmt"
	"regexp"
	"testing"
\)

func TestDebugLincolnLawyer2\(t *testing.T\) {
	// Test the raw regex on the quality text
	text := "NF WEB-DL 1080p x264 EAC3 DDP 5.1 Subs-InChY"
	p := regexp.MustCompile\(`-\([A-Za-z0-9]+\)\(?:\\.[a-z0-9]{2,4}\)?/Users/jatassi/Git/SlipStream/internal/library/scanner/parsedebug2_test.go \)
	m := p.FindStringSubmatch\(text\)
	fmt.Printf\("Release group regex on quality text: %v\\n", m\)

	// Now test ParseFilename on the directory name
	dirName := "The Lincoln Lawyer S04 NF WEB-DL 1080p x264 EAC3 DDP 5.1 Subs-InChY"
	parsed := ParseFilename\(dirName\)
	fmt.Printf\("Parsed release group: %q\\n", parsed.ReleaseGroup\)
	
	// Test with a dot extension \(as if it were a file\)
	dirNameWithExt := "The Lincoln Lawyer S04 NF WEB-DL 1080p x264 EAC3 DDP 5.1 Subs-InChY.mkv"
	parsed2 := ParseFilename\(dirNameWithExt\)
	fmt.Printf\("Parsed \(with ext\) release group: %q\\n", parsed2.ReleaseGroup\)
}
GOEOF)

Bash(/tmp/date_debug2.go << 'EOF'
package main

import \(
    "database/sql"
    "fmt"
    "time"
    _ "modernc.org/sqlite"
\)

func main\(\) {
    db, _ := sql.Open\("sqlite", ":memory:"\)
    defer db.Close\(\)
    
    db.Exec\("CREATE TABLE test \(d DATE, theatrical DATETIME\)"\)
    
    pastDate := time.Now\(\).AddDate\(0, 0, -7\)
    todayDate, _ := time.Parse\("2006-01-02", time.Now\(\).Format\("2006-01-02"\)\)
    
    db.Exec\("INSERT INTO test \(d, theatrical\) VALUES \(?, ?\)", 
        sql.NullTime{Time: pastDate, Valid: true},
        sql.NullTime{Time: todayDate, Valid: true}\)
    
    // Test substr approach
    var substrD string
    db.QueryRow\("SELECT substr\(d, 1, 10\) FROM test"\).Scan\(&substrD\)
    fmt.Printf\("substr\(d, 1, 10\): %q\\n", substrD\)
    
    // Test substr comparison for past date
    var comp1 bool
    db.QueryRow\("SELECT substr\(d, 1, 10\) <= date\('now'\) FROM test"\).Scan\(&comp1\)
    fmt.Printf\("substr\(d,1,10\) <= date\('now'\) [past]: %v\\n", comp1\)
    
    // Test theatrical + 90 days with substr
    var theatrical90 string
    db.QueryRow\("SELECT date\(substr\(theatrical, 1, 10\), '+90 days'\) FROM test"\).Scan\(&theatrical90\)
    fmt.Printf\("date\(substr\(theatrical,1,10\), '+90 days'\): %q\\n", theatrical90\)
    
    // Test same-day comparison with substr
    db.Exec\("DELETE FROM test"\)
    db.Exec\("INSERT INTO test \(d, theatrical\) VALUES \(?, ?\)", 
        sql.NullTime{Time: time.Now\(\), Valid: true},
        sql.NullTime{Time: time.Now\(\), Valid: true}\)
    
    var comp2 bool
    db.QueryRow\("SELECT substr\(d, 1, 10\) <= date\('now'\) FROM test"\).Scan\(&comp2\)
    fmt.Printf\("substr\(d,1,10\) <= date\('now'\) [today]: %v\\n", comp2\)
    
    // Verify date\(\) vs substr\(\) on the stored format
    var rawD string
    var dateD sql.NullString
    db.QueryRow\("SELECT d, date\(d\) FROM test"\).Scan\(&rawD, &dateD\)
    fmt.Printf\("Raw d: %q, date\(d\) valid=%v value=%q\\n", rawD, dateD.Valid, dateD.String\)
}
EOF)
